Class CompositeDiscoveryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.discovery.CompositeDiscoveryClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultCompositeDiscoveryClient

    public abstract class CompositeDiscoveryClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiscoveryClient
    A composite implementation combining all registered DiscoveryClient instances.
